quote: The best revenge is to improve yourself.
author: Imam Ali

quote: He who knows himself, knows his Lord.
author: Saying of the wise

quote: Patience is the key to joy.
author: Rumi

quote: A single day of a wise man is more valuable than the whole life of a fool.
author: Arabian Proverb

quote: Do not be a slave to others when you were born free.
author: Imam Ali

quote: Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: The ink of the scholar is more sacred than the blood of the martyr.
author: Islamic Proverb

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger prevents a thousand moments of regret.
author: Imam Ali

quote: What is destined will reach you, even if it is beneath two mountains.
author: Imam Al-Ghazali

quote: The greatest struggle is to battle your own soul.
author: Saying of the wise

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: Knowledge without action is useless, and action without knowledge is foolishness.
author: Imam Al-Ghazali

quote: The less you speak, the more you will hear.
author: Proverb

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: A wise person learns from the mistakes of others, a fool learns from their own.
author: Proverb

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The cure for ignorance is to ask questions.
author: Ibn Sina

quote: The pen is the tongue of the mind.
author: Ibn Khaldun

quote: Having a thousand friends is not a miracle. A miracle is having one friend who will stand by you when thousands are against you.
author: Imam Ali

quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Proverb

quote: A single conversation with a wise person is better than ten years of study.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: In the darkest nights, stars shine more brightly.
author: Proverb

quote: Fall down seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Real wealth is not having many possessions, but having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: To speak less is wisdom, to eat less is healthy, and to mingle less is safe.
author: Umar ibn al-Khattab

quote: Through patience, great things are accomplished.
author: Imam Ali

quote: Tears of repentance can wash away bad deeds.
author: Islamic Proverb

quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
author: Proverb

quote: Forgiveness is the best form of revenge.
author: Imam Ali

quote: Good character is the best of companions.
author: Islamic Proverb

quote: If you wish to be a writer, write.
author: Epictetus

quote: A beautiful person has a beautiful heart.
author: Proverb

quote: A wise man can distinguish between the possible and the impossible.
author: Ibn Khaldun

quote: The desire for knowledge is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Proverb

quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: The tongue is small, but its mistakes can be great.
author: Imam Al-Ghazali

quote: He who is patient is victorious.
author: Proverb

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: The bigger the mind, the less it is offended.
author: Proverb

quote: If you want to know a person's character, see how they treat those who can do nothing for them.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: Do good, and good will come to you.
author: Proverb

quote: A little knowledge that is used is worth more than much knowledge that is idle.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: Doubt is the key to knowledge.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: The fool wonders, the wise man asks.
author: Proverb

quote: A person's true measure is their will.
author: Imam Ali

quote: A wise man makes his own decisions, an ignorant man follows public opinion.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: When you know yourself, you are empowered. When you accept yourself, you are invincible.
author: Tina Lifford

quote: Say only what is necessary and in few words.
author: Epictetus

quote: True silence is the rest of the mind.
author: William Penn

quote: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
author: Rumi

quote: He who has health has hope; and he who has hope has everything.
author: Arabian Proverb

quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: An empty mind is a workshop for mischief.
author: Imam Al-Ghazali

quote: Justice is the soul of a nation.
author: Proverb

quote: To change the world, start with yourself.
author: Proverb

quote: Honesty is the best policy.
author: Proverb

quote: It is not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The pen is mightier than the sword.
author: Proverb

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The heart that knows contentment is always rich.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: A good deed is never lost.
author: Proverb

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Control your anger, and you will conquer your enemy.
author: Proverb

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a person can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: True wealth is the health of the soul.
author: Proverb

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: The person who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Proverb

quote: The obstacle is the way.
author: Stoic Proverb

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good person should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Fortune favors the bold.
author: Latin Proverb

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn
